resources.string: The responsibility of knowledge is sharing.

string-array.name: quotes_array
string-array.item: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. ― Oscar Wilde"
"Super easy, barely an inconvenience ― Ryan George, Screen Rant"
"If it isn\'t on Google, it doesn\'t exist- Jimmy Wales "
"Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose. - Bill Gates"
"If you want to be inventive — you have to be willing to fail. - Jeff Bezos"
"Do or do not. There is no try.- Yoda"
"The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. - Nolan Bushnell"
"May the odds be ever in your favor. - Hunger Games"
"The important thing is not to stop questioning. - Albert Einstein"
